pages.text: A Circle Talisman is a way to store $(item)Circle Glyphs$() in the talisman itself, for later deploy or quickly moving them. Using a $(l:)Rite of Binding$(/l) the circle glyphs will be erased from the world and stored in the talisman.

pages.title: Using the Talisman
pages.text: Holding the talisman will show a preview of where the circles would be placed, and using the talisman on a new location with enough empty space will put back the circles in the world in the previewed position. In case of obstruction, a fail sound will be played and operation will fail.
